participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, Jake loves to connect with others and is always looking for new ways to enjoy life.
participant_1.background: I start working with my brother in law in Hollywood. I can’t do math. Sometimes I like to visit thrift shops. I love going to the gym. I love eating at McDonald's.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Lily is easygoing and passionate about fitness and music. She enjoys a laid-back lifestyle and values comfort and connection.
participant_2.background: My mornings consist of listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers while I get ready for the day. I wake up, check my schedule for the day, and go about my business. I like my job, but I don't have a lot of family support. My mom is my favorite person of all people. I only dress up for special occasions because I prefer to be comfortable in my own skin.

content.text: What's up?
Not much, just getting ready for work.
What kind of work do you do?
I'm a personal trainer at a gym.
Oh cool, I'm trying to get in shape and have been looking for a gym.
Well, if you're ever in the area, come check us out!
Will do, thanks! What do you do for fun?
I love to go to concerts and listen to music.
Me too, what's your favorite band?
Red Hot Chili Peppers, they're my favorite band of all time.
Nice, I love them too!
What are some of your hobbies?
I like to go thrift shopping and find cool clothes.
Me too, I love finding unique pieces of clothing.
I also love to go to the gym.
That's awesome, what kind of workouts do you like to do?
I like to do a mix of cardio and strength training.
That's good, I need to start working out more.
You should, it's a great way to relieve stress.
I know, I know. I'm going to start working out more.
Good! It's never too late to start.
Thanks for the motivation!
No problem, you're welcome!
